vote.title: To Honor the Installation of Pastor Tony Ransom as the Senior Pastor at Rhema Christian Center
vote.description:
Title
 
To Honor the Installation of Pastor Tony Ransom as the Senior Pastor at Rhema Christian Center
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Pastor Tony Ransom has demonstrated unwavering faith, leadership, and service throughout his ministerial journey, earning the respect and admiration of both his congregation and the broader community; and 
WHEREAS, Pastor Ransom has served faithfully in various capacities within the church, exemplifying humility, dedication, and a steadfast commitment to spiritual growth and community engagement; and
WHEREAS, Rhema Christian Center has long been a beacon of hope and inspiration in the Columbus community, and the installation of Pastor Ransom as Senior Pastor marks a significant and promising new chapter in its legacy; and
WHEREAS, Pastor Ransom’s vision for ministry includes empowering individuals through faith, outreach, and education, aligning with Rhema Christian Center’s mission to transform lives and strengthen families; and
WHEREAS, the City of Columbus recognizes the importance of spiritual leadership in fostering community well-being, and honors the contributions of faith leaders who uplift and guide their congregations with compassion and integrity; and
WHEREAS, on this momentous occasion, the Columbus City Council and President Shannon G. Hardin commend Pastor Tony Ransom for his dedication to serving the people of Columbus and celebrate his installation as Senior Pastor of Rhema Christian Center; now, therefore,
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council hereby honors the Installation of Pastor Tony Ransom as the Senior Pastor at Rhema Christian Center.
